alert.note: Alert for Mainland Dare; Mainland Hyde (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued September 23 at 7:58PM EDT until September 24 at 7:00AM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...1 to 2 feet of inundation above ground level in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways.. * WHERE...Areas along the Albemarle, Croatan, and Pamlico Sounds, Alligator River, and adjacent tidal creeks, and areas along the Pamlico Sound, Pungo and lower Pamlico Rivers. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Up to 1 to 2 feet of inundation above ground level is possible in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways resulting in a low threat of property damage. Some roads and low lying property including parking lots, parks, lawns, and homes adjacent to the waterfront will experience shallow flooding.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
